definition: variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: None of the surveyed materials were found to be suitable for use as impedance matched specular radar absorbers.
sentences.chinese: 考察材料没有发现适用于镜面雷达吸收剂的阻抗匹配。

sentences.english: This result is applicable to the impedance matching of other RF power.
sentences.chinese: 这一结果同样适用于其它射频电源的阻抗匹配研究。

sentences.english: In addition, selection of dynamite type should satisfy impedance matching principle.
sentences.chinese: 另外根据药型的选择要满足阻抗匹配原则。

sentences.english: The impedance-matching balance transformer is used to solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 采用阻抗匹配变压器可有效地解决这一问题。

sentences.english: The cross-polarization isolation and impedance matching are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了天线的交叉极化特性和阻抗匹配特性。

sentences.english: In the transceiver, the wideband impendence match circuit is used to avoid the reflections because of impedance mismatch.
sentences.chinese: 利用宽带阻抗匹配电路解决信号的传输线反射问题。

sentences.english: Bandwidth Enhancement of Microstrip Slot Patch Antenna Through Impedance Matching Network …
sentences.chinese: 以阻抗匹配网路增加频宽之微带槽孔贴片天线。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
